languages.text: "Так мы зовем Первого из ткачей. Того, кто постиг мудрость Завета Паутины, дабы других за собой вести. Пусть на мне лежит долг наставлять и нити кровавые плести — в остальном я такой же слуга Его и твой, как прочие в храме сем".

traits.locale_text: "Так мы зовем Первого из ткачей. Того, кто постиг мудрость Завета Паутины, дабы других за собой вести. Пусть на мне лежит долг наставлять и нити кровавые плести — в остальном я такой же слуга Его и твой, как прочие в храме сем".

languages.text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."
languages.original_text: "Так мы зовем Первого из ткачей. Того, кто постиг мудрость Завета Паутины, дабы других за собой вести. Пусть на мне лежит долг наставлять и нити кровавые плести — в остальном я такой же слуга Его и твой, как прочие в храме сем".

traits.locale_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

"It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

"It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

"It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

"It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

languages.text: “这是首席织网者的头衔。首席织网者掌握着织血罗网的教义与智慧，会指引其他人踏上正途。我也同样有责任教导他人、纺织丝线，但就其他方面而言，我与这座圣殿里的其他人一样，都是不死之神的仆人，也是你的仆人。”
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

traits.locale_text: “这是首席织网者的头衔。首席织网者掌握着织血罗网的教义与智慧，会指引其他人踏上正途。我也同样有责任教导他人、纺织丝线，但就其他方面而言，我与这座圣殿里的其他人一样，都是不死之神的仆人，也是你的仆人。”

languages.text: «Es el nombre que damos al Primer Tejedor, alguien que ha asimilado la sabiduría de la Doctrina de la Red para guiar a otros. Puede que mi deber sea instruir y tejer patrones de sangre, pero por lo demás soy tan sierva suya y del Inmortal como cualquier otro acólito de este templo».
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

traits.locale_text: «Es el nombre que damos al Primer Tejedor, alguien que ha asimilado la sabiduría de la Doctrina de la Red para guiar a otros. Puede que mi deber sea instruir y tejer patrones de sangre, pero por lo demás soy tan sierva suya y del Inmortal como cualquier otro acólito de este templo».

languages.text: 「これは、『最初の紡ぎ手』に与えられる名前です。他の者を導くために、網の教義の知恵を学んだ者。私は血塗られた糸を紡ぎ、指導する義務があるかもしれませんが、それ以外のあらゆる点において、この神殿にいる他の誰よりも、主の従者であり、同時にあなたのものでもあります」
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、『最初の紡ぎ手』に与えられる名前です。他の者を導くために、網の教義の知恵を学んだ者。私は血塗られた糸を紡ぎ、指導する義務があるかもしれませんが、それ以外のあらゆる点において、この神殿にいる他の誰よりも、主の従者であり、同時にあなたのものでもあります」

languages.text: "Diesen Namen geben wir dem Ersten Spinner. Der Person, die die Weisheit der Grundsätze des Netzes erlernt hat, um andere zu führen. Ich mag die Pflicht haben, Befehle zu erteilen und blutige Netze zu spinnen, aber ansonsten bin ich ebenso Sein und Euer Diener wie alle anderen in diesem Tempel.
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

traits.locale_text: "Diesen Namen geben wir dem Ersten Spinner. Der Person, die die Weisheit der Grundsätze des Netzes erlernt hat, um andere zu führen. Ich mag die Pflicht haben, Befehle zu erteilen und blutige Netze zu spinnen, aber ansonsten bin ich ebenso Sein und Euer Diener wie alle anderen in diesem Tempel.

languages.text: « C'est ainsi que nous appelons notre premier tisseur, qui a fait sienne la sagesse des Préceptes de la Toile afin de guider ses condisciples. S'il m'incombe d'instruire mes pairs et de tisser des fils de sang, je n'en demeure pas moins Son serviteur et le vôtre, au même titre que tous les membres de ce temple. »
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi que nous appelons notre premier tisseur, qui a fait sienne la sagesse des Préceptes de la Toile afin de guider ses condisciples. S'il m'incombe d'instruire mes pairs et de tisser des fils de sang, je n'en demeure pas moins Sa servante et la vôtre, au même titre que tous les membres de ce temple. »

languages.text: "İlk Dokurlara verdiğimiz isimdir. Diğerlerine önderlik etmek için Ağ'ın İlkeleri'nde saklı bilgeliği öğrenendir. Görev vermek ve kanlı iplikleri dokumak benim vazifem olsa da diğer tüm açılardan tapınaktı herkes gibi ben de O'nun ve sizin hizmetkârınızım."
languages.original_text: "It is the name we give to the First Spinner. The one who has learnt the wisdom of the Tenets of the Web in order to lead others. I may have a duty to instruct and spin bloody threads, but in all other ways I am as much His servant and yours as anyone else in this temple."
